NAME: Rabies Immunoglobulin
CIMS CLASS: May interfere with immune response to live attenuated virus vaccines. Immunosuppresive agents (e.g. alkylating agents| metabolites| corticosteroids| radiation) may increase risk of rabies infection due to decrease in antibody response to postexposure prophylaxis. Increased risk of bleeding with anticoagulants.
